about_the_game:
Embark on a Mystical Journey Through the Heart of Brazilian Folklore

Step into the world of Matinta, a third-person adventure game that takes you deep into the vibrant and mystical landscapes of Brazil. Experience the tale of Gracie, a courageous and magical dog with a destiny to heal cursed lands and restore harmony to nature.

Set in biomes inspired by Brazil’s diverse ecosystems, Matinta offers a unique blend of exploration, puzzle-solving, and cultural storytelling. Traverse five breathtaking realms—each paralyzed by a dark curse—and uncover ancient secrets hidden within their lush environments.

Features

  • Healing Power: Use Gracie’s mystical abilities to cleanse corrupted biomes, reviving flora, fauna, and unlocking new areas as you progress. Witness the transformation of cursed lands back to their natural beauty.

  • Explore Diverse Biomes: Immerse yourself in stunning landscapes inspired by Brazil’s Pampas, Mata Atlântica, Pantanal, Cerrado, and Amazon. Each region is meticulously crafted to showcase its unique flora, fauna, and folklore.

  • Puzzle-Solving and Discovery: Engage in intricate environmental puzzles and challenges tied to the rich mythology of the land. Collect ancient artifacts and unlock hidden altars to unveil new paths.

  • Live the Legend: Encounter legendary guardians and mythical creatures from Brazilian folklore. Learn their stories, heal their curses, and restore balance to the natural world.

  • Play as Gracie: Experience the game through the eyes of a determined and endearing canine protagonist. Use her unique abilities—barking, sniffing, and healing—to interact with the environment and overcome challenges.

  • A Visual and Audio Masterpiece: Lose yourself in the game’s stylized art direction, which brings the vibrant ecosystems of Brazil to life. The immersive soundtrack enhances every moment with tones of mysticism and adventure.

What’s Included in the Full Game

  • Five Distinct Biomes: Explore richly detailed ecosystems, each with its own challenges and cultural significance.

  • Mythical Guardians: Encounter and heal legendary creatures inspired by Brazilian folklore.

  • 8+ Hours of Playtime: A thoughtfully crafted narrative adventure that balances exploration, puzzles, and storytelling.

  • Hidden Collectibles: Discover artifacts and secrets that reveal more about the world of Matinta.

The Heart of the Game

Guided by Matinta, a powerful spirit and protector of the forest, Gracie’s journey is one of courage, empathy, and hope. As you heal the biomes and confront the malevolent dark spirit, you’ll uncover a deeply emotional narrative interwoven with the culture and legends of Brazil.

Who Should Play Matinta?

Matinta is perfect for players who love narrative-driven games with emotional depth and stunning visuals. If you’ve enjoyed titles like Stray, Spirit of the North, Kena: Bridge of Spirits, or Lost Ember, you’ll feel right at home in this heartfelt adventure.

Wishlist now and join Gracie’s journey to heal the world, one biome at a time!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon R7 260x (2 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580 (4 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Designed for smooth performance with higher graphical settings
